txt.en: Orcs appear to have been dragging supply-carts to their encampments; it looks like they may be gathering provisions for a major offensive.

'You found evidence of enemy movement towards the eastern gate while you were out, did you? That does not bode well.\n\n'Alas that this great hall should be so sullied by all manner of things. What should we do?'
Orcs appear to have been dragging supply-carts to their encampments; it looks like they may be gathering provisions for a major offensive.
The mine carts are in Nud-melek at the northern cross-roads of Sudulthurkh.\n\nMazog's forces are dragging mining-carts filled with supplies through Nud-melek.
Svanr can be found near Sudulthurkh in northern Nud-melek.\n\nYou should tell Svanr that you have destroyed several carts of the goblins in Nud-melek, hindering their exit from the mines.
